channel.title: REITs on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in REITs on FinanClub

item.title: O
item.description: score:-12 Chances: Realty Income Corporation has declared its 643rd consecutive common stock monthly dividend, showing a consistent and reliable track record of dividend payouts. Risks: With approximately 200 REITs on the market, it is important to carefully consider the relative strength and performance of Realty Income Corporation compared to its peers.

item.title: AGNC
item.description: score:294 Chances: AGNC Investment (AGNC) is a wise investment option at present due to an active portfolio-management strategy, decent liquidity and an attractive ROE. MPLX should have plenty of fuel to continue growing its big-time payout. Compared to this past year, 2024 is expected to be much better for the economy, and that means it will look even better for the stock market.
